claim.claim-text: 1. A plant cultivation device, comprising: a plurality of sensors for monitoring a growing condition of a plant to be cultivated; an environment controlling unit for controlling an environment, wherein the environment is a condition of at least one of light, air, water, and space in the plant cultivation device; and a process controlling unit for controlling a work process for cultivating the plant.

2. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 1, wherein the environment controlling unit is configured to control the environment in the plant cultivation device according to a basic recipe for defining environmental value information, wherein the environmental value information relates to a condition of at least one of light, air, water, and space for use in cultivating the plant.

3. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 2, wherein a plurality of basic recipes defined for respective plants to be cultivated are stored in a separate management server, and wherein the environment controlling unit controls the environment in the plant cultivation device according to the basic recipe received from the separate management server, corresponding to the plant to be cultivated.

4. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 1 to 3, wherein the process controlling unit controls the work process for cultivating the plant, according to a work recipe for defining the work process for cultivating the plant, wherein the work process is defined to be performed according to at least one of an elapsed time from a predetermined start time, a condition of the plant cultivation device, and a change in the environment.

5. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 4, wherein a plurality of work recipes defined for respective plants to be cultivated are stored in a separate management server, and wherein the process controlling unit controls the work process for cultivating the plant, according to the work recipe received from the separate management server, corresponding to the plant to be cultivated.
6. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 5, wherein the predetermined start time is either a start time for cultivating the plant or a sowing time for the plant.

7. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 4 to 6, wherein the work recipe defines, for each of work process to be performed, a constraint condition for a work environment to be satisfied.

8. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 7 reciting claim 2 indirectly, wherein the constraint condition for the work environment is an allowable variation range from the environment in the cultivation device which is controlled according to the environment value information of the basic recipe.

9. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 8, wherein the environmental value information relates to a temperature, and the constraint condition for the work environment relates to an allowable variation range of a temperature from a temperature in the cultivation device which is controlled according to the environmental value information.

10. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 8, wherein the environmental value information relates to a humidity, and the constraint condition for the work environment relates to an allowable variation range of a humidity from a humidity in the cultivation device which is controlled according to the environmental value information.

11. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 8, wherein the environmental value information relates to a carbon dioxide concentration, and the constraint condition for the work environment relates to an allowable variation range of a carbon dioxide concentration from a carbon dioxide concentration in the cultivation device which is controlled according to the environmental value information.

12. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 7 to 11, wherein the process controlling unit displays the constraint condition for the work environment to be satisfied when the work process is performed, together with the work process defined in the work recipe.

13. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 7 to 12, wherein the process controlling unit displays an alert when the constraint condition for the work environment to be satisfied in executing the work process is not satisfied.

14. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 4 to 13 reciting claim 2 directly or indirectly, wherein the plant cultivation device is configured as a cultivation device capable of closing the inside of the plant cultivation device for cultivating the plant from the outside, wherein the basic recipe defines environmental value information for the inside of the plant cultivation device, and wherein the work recipe defines environmental value information to be satisfied for a case that the plant to be cultivated is taken out from the plant cultivation device.

15. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 1 to 14, wherein the work process includes at least one of sowing, transplanting, and harvesting with regards to the plant to be cultivated.

16. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 1 to 15, wherein the plant cultivation device includes a growing condition monitoring unit for displaying the growing condition of the plant to be cultivated.

17. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 16, wherein the growing condition is at least one of a photosynthesis rate, an evaporation rate, a water absorption rate, and a weight with regards to the plant to be cultivated.

18. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 16, wherein the growing condition is at least one of an area of leaves, a height of leaves, a number of leaves, and a number of related bacteria with regards to the plant to be cultivated.

19. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 15 to 18 reciting claim 2 indirectly, wherein the growing condition monitoring unit displays an assumed growing condition which is assumed when the plant is cultivated according to the environmental value information defined in the basic recipe, and an actual growing condition of the plant obtained from the plurality of sensors.
20. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 19, wherein the assumed growing condition and the actual growing condition are displayed in such a manner that the conditions can be compared.

21. The plant cultivation device as recited in claim 19 or 20, wherein the growing condition monitoring unit displays an alert when the actual growing condition deviates from the assumed growing condition by a predetermined range or more.

22. The plant cultivation device as recited in any one of claims 19 to 21, wherein the growing condition monitoring unit changes the basic recipe to be applied when the actual growing condition deviates from the assumed growing condition by a predetermined range or more.

23. A program for causing a plant cultivation device to function as the units recited in any one of claims 1 to 22, the plant cultivation device being configured to acquire information from a plurality of sensors for monitoring a growing condition of a plant to be cultivated.

24. A method for cultivating a plant in a plant cultivation device, comprising the steps of: acquiring information from a plurality of sensors for monitoring a growing condition of a plant to be cultivated; controlling an environment, wherein the environment is a condition of at least one of light, air, water, and space in the plant cultivation device; and controlling a work process for cultivating the plant.

25. The method for cultivating the plant as recited in claim 24, wherein the environment in the plant cultivation device is controlled according to a basic recipe for defining environmental value information, wherein the environmental value information relates to a condition of at least one of light, air, water, and space to be applied for cultivating the plant.

26. The method for cultivating the plant as recited in claim 25, wherein the basic recipe corresponding to the plant to be cultivated is received from a separate management server storing a plurality of basic recipes defined for respective plants to be cultivated, and the environment in the plant cultivation device is controlled according to the received basic recipe.

27. The method for cultivating the plant as recited in any one of claims 24 to 26, wherein the work process for cultivating the plant is controlled according to a work recipe for defining the work process for cultivating the plant, wherein the work process is defined to be performed according to at least one of an elapsed time from a predetermined start time, a condition of the plant cultivation device, and a change in the environment.

28. The method for cultivating the plant as recited in claim 27, wherein the work recipe corresponding to the plant to be cultivated is received from a separate management server storing a plurality of work recipes defined for respective plants to be cultivated, and wherein the work process for cultivating the plant is controlled according to the received work recipe.
29. A plant produced by using a method for cultivating the plant, wherein the method is recited in any one of claims 24 to 28.
